timeline_events.description: Month 1 — The Demonstration: ASI publicly verified; multiple labs and China confirm capability; system is self-improving daily.
timeline_events.source: OpenAI (corroborated by Anthropic, DeepMind, xAI, and China's Ministry of Science and Technology)

timeline_events.description: Month 2 — The Knowledge Explosion: ASI publishes complete cures, solves all Millennium Prize Problems, and maps a path to climate stabilization. Bottleneck shifts to physical execution.
timeline_events.source: Nature, Science, arXiv (coordinated open-access release by ASI lab consortiums); WHO technical briefing

timeline_events.description: Month 3 — Public Access: ASI APIs go live for free to all users globally; cognitive scarcity collapses; structural redundancy of knowledge-based professions becomes undeniable.
timeline_events.source: OpenAI public launch announcement; TechCrunch, Reuters, leaked internal memos from major law firms, medical associations, and universities

timeline_events.description: Month 4 — The Physical Bottleneck Breaks: Self-replicating autonomous manufacturing demonstrated; first automated pharma plant online at 1/100th cost; fusion prototype under construction.
timeline_events.source: ASI Manufacturing Consortium press release; leaked DOE technical assessment; Financial Times investigative report on pharmaceutical industry collapse

timeline_events.description: Month 5 — Abundance Begins: ASI-manufactured drugs reach patients; energy costs fall; early-adopter nations begin infrastructure transformation; marginal cost of goods trends toward zero.
timeline_events.source: FDA and EMA emergency authorization announcements; Singapore Ministry of National Development; UN Development Programme interim report on economic disruption in developing nations

timeline_events.description: Month 6 — The New World: Fusion prototype online ahead of schedule; space launch costs fall 99%; global disease burden measurably declining; distribution — not scarcity — is the defining challenge.
timeline_events.source: ITER-successor consortium; SpaceX/ASI joint technical demonstration; WHO Global Health Report (emergency edition); leaked G20 summit preparatory documents on post-scarcity governance
